about: Baguio City, Philippines based artist Mark aka. Deo Dude is an artist specializing in logo designs, vector and raster illustrations. He's been making arts and illustrations since he can remember. Started as a freelancer in the traditional arts and lately in the animation field which was cut short. He never let go of his love for illustrations and graphic design. Now he's devoted his time and craft as a designer and illustrator.

about:
Welcome to my profile. My name is Szekeres László and I'm a graphic designer, with many years of experience. I live in the beautiful city of Oradea, Romania, with my even more beautiful wife, Henrietta:). My "designer career" started when I was 4 and I drew tons of cows and horses..^^ Since then I developed my ability, until graphic design became my passion and my job as well.
  If you like my works and you are interested in logo or stationary design, feel free to contact me.

about:
Hello,
  I am Faraz, a logo and identity designer with a decade's worth of experience under my belt. I have been passionate about design and art since my teenage years and has successfully channelled that passion into a full-time profession. I aspire for perfection in my designs, which I achieve by incorporating simplicity and minimalism in my work, nothing too over-the-top.

about: Hello! My name is Myin Uddin. I'm an enthusiastic and creative graphic artist who is passionate about Logo. I'm a fun-loving guy who loves nature, pets, and dressing up! I'm also a bit of a perfectionist! I freelance exclusively on 99design. Available for 1-to-1 projects.

about: I've been doing Branding & Graphic Designing for many years. I am always excited to work with clients that have high expectations and want my skills to help them meet their goals. My primary objective is to continue learning more each and every day. The design world continues to grow in so much that I love to stay on top of it all.

about: I'm a young graphic designer who has worked in graphic content creation, logo design, and brand identity systems for about 10 years. I am the owner of a small branding and graphic design agency focused on providing small businesses and start ups with the brand strategy and graphic assets at an affordable price range so that they are better equipped to compete with larger, well established brands in their market space. My design aesthetic would best be described as simple, modern, and timeless.

about:
I began my journey as a graphic designer in 2019, freelancing for some small businesses in my home town. Later, I fell for typography and lettering, which has become my main focus over the last year.
  Nowadays, my mission is to bring life to brands by providing hand-lettering logotypes.

about:
Hello! My name's Anastasia and I'm a graphic designer from St. Petersburg, Russia. I specialize in logo design of any kind like: vintage, cartoon, illustration or abstract. I also do book covers and product packaging design.
  Would be great to work with you :)

about: Agé de 31 ans, Un parcours atypique de graffiti-artiste (15 ans) reconverti en graphiste à temps plein. J'évolue aujourd'hui dans différents secteur comme les arts plastiques (décoration murale, peinture sur toile), et essentiellement l'infographie pour des clients professionnels, de la création de logo à la charte graphique complète. Mes inspirations sont personnelles et proviennent du graffiti et de la calligraphie.
tags: ['Entry Level']

about: My passion for art began while I was still in elementary school, when as a young child I liked to draw imaginary logos. In high school this passion remained and I always felt this was what I had to do in the future.I can also create animated logos or intro to videos

about:
Hi! My name is Florin, I am passionate about logo design and curious about extraterrestrial life.
  I graduated as a computer engineer in Romania and moved to Peru some years ago, I am a freelance graphic designer and web developer.
  If you have a project you think I am suited for, feel free to leave me a message.

about: Hey!  I'm Artmin, I am a Graphic Designer specializing in Illustrations and identity design. I've been exploring and experimenting with creative art since I was a child. I enjoy new and challenging projects that push and challenge me to evolve and learn in the field of design. about: My name is Jose and I am the founder of RoughSketch Designs. I am freelance graphic designer. The majority of my time I spent designing and implementing marketing promotions for businesses of all sizes such as logos, websites, letterhead, business cards, packaging and more. Feel free to contact me if you are in need of any design work.

about: I'm an Interior Architecture student at the University of Indonesia, but also a self-taught digital illustrator. To me, the most important thing in illustration is the message it tries to convey. I see design as a problem solver, and illustration is a tool to help designs achieve their goals. It's not about how fancy it looks. To me, when the message is understood without needing further explanation, it's an illustration that works

about: Hi, my name is Francesco Saviano. The computer graphics and photography are my world. I love what I do and I'm always looking for new trends and inspirations for my creations. I use Photoshop to create modern website templates and book covers. I use Illustrator to create awesome logos. My background also   includes basic knowledge of the Blender 3D modeling software. I have intermediate knowledge of 3d Texturing. My job is my greatest passion. In my free time I paint in oil.
